title: However in case of the lands belonging to Government, Semi-Government Undertakings and Local Bodies S
clause_text: However in case of the lands belonging to Government, Semi-Government Undertakings and Local Bodies S.R.S. shall be taken up by S.R.A. through tendering process.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: However in case of the lands belonging to Government, Semi-Government Undertakings and Local Bodies S.R.S. shall be taken up by S.R.A. through tendering process.
